website_summaries.verdict: An attractive bike in styles for boys and girls by a top name in the industry. Suitable for youngsters who are learning to ride mountain bikes.
pros: A rugged bike with sporty looks that's available in boys' and girls' styles
Built to for ages five to nine
Shimano TZ-31 and twist shifters make it easy to tackle slopes and hills
Has six speeds, making it ideal for new riders
cons: Tires occasionally go flat for no apparent reason

customer_reviews.title: Huffy Bicycle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike to ride around my neighborhood. My knees hurt sometimes so that I wanted something was easy to peddle and easy for me to climb on the bike. That is why I purchased a bike that is considered a ladies bike. I some trouble with the front brake as it was scrapping my front tire but my neighbor, who rides one of those $1000+ bikes all over the place came over and adjusted it for me. Otherwise I like the bike. The seat is a bit hard on one's butt but that is the way for most bikes so I will have to purchase a more comfortable seat. Otherwise, an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Trigg

customer_reviews.title: Poor Gear System
customer_reviews.text: The gear system is EXTREMELY weak and honestly useless. Every gear is literally the same. I decided to donate this to a teenager because such problems wouldn't bother them as much as it would a grown adult.
customer_reviews.author: World Peace 4 EVERYONE!

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Bike
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, but the bike chain comes off about 50% of the time when changing gears. The seat is uncomfortable, which is somewhat expected for the price and that's an easy fix but the chain coming off this often is very annoying and potentially dangerous. (And yes, we put it together correctly)
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because the bike was great ... but 3 stars because it arrived fully packaged & surrounded by form, but the forks were irretrievably bent. My daughter was so disappointed. went to Walmart and got one there.
customer_reviews.author: PololvrTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike for the Money.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike, took about 20 mins to assemble. Very easy and comes with all the tools needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Manzi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but difficult to shift gears
customer_reviews.text: We have been really impressed with the sturdiness of the bike. It is a pretty good quality for the price. I took a star off because the way the gears are shifted is difficult for a young rider (our 6 year old).
customer_reviews.author: BuchS

customer_reviews.title: Great bike great price
customer_reviews.text: Bike is really nice, I loved you it was a for a gift except the seat is very uncomfortable but for the price just got a new seat
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy this again... Wouldn't recommend you buy it either.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 16yr old son 6 months ago. He rides this all the time. The assembly of the bike was easy. The petal broke, the chain comes off all the time, the gears at the petals are bent, the seat pole is bent, we're having to replace the rear tire due to it keeps getting a flat, the brakes are constantly coming loose & no matter how much we tighten the handle bars they're constantly coming loose too. I thought this bike was made of better materials, but apparently I was mistaken. I won't be buying this bike again. We shouldn't be having to fix & replace so many things already.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: A bike any kid will want to ride
customer_reviews.text: Who would have thought there will be a shortage of bikes during pandemic. Well, this was the only one 20 inch bike available on Amazon when we were looking in June 2020 for my 9 yo who wanted to learn to ride one without training wheels. I’m glad this was the choice (well, only choice) we had. It’s very stylish, very sturdy, Putting together was a breeze, adjusting everything was a bit difficult and confusing, but overall we are very happy with it. Above all, my son learned to ride it in one week. We’ve been taking it to a park almost everyday. We love that he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: yorkiies

customer_reviews.title: Chain guard broke on second ride
customer_reviews.text: The bike was easy to assemble and rides nicely, however on my first ride the handle bars continually slipped from after tightening them during first assembly. So I was forced to super glue the threads to prevent It from happening again. In addition the chain guard also broke off completely during the second ride. So good bike for money but expect some cheaply made parts here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy construction, needed parts, but rides well.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for! Over all the frame and tires of this bike are reasonable, but very shortly after starting to ride it, one of the crank arms bent slightly. This meant I had to replace the crank arms. The pedals had to be replaced as well , they are pretty flimsy. As others have stated, the seat was very uncomfortable and needed to be replaced as well. The brakes are okay. Overall, I feel like I should have just spent a bit more and got a better bike. Construction of this bike can do with Improvement. Would not purchase again, but will make it work.
customer_reviews.author: 4TheLoveOfHiking

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and working bike!
customer_reviews.text: I have a shorter than average 11 year old. I was worried that the bike was still too tall for her, but we were able to lower the seat all the way down and it’s perfect. My only complaint was that by lowering the seat all the way down we had to move the rear reflector because it wouldn’t allow for the seat to go down all the way. Otherwise, there were no parts missing, no damage and assembly was less than 20 minutes with two people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: After second use it already broke!!! What a piece of crap!! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Rock18

customer_reviews.title: Good value bike
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my Girlfriend. She’s 5’5” and has to stand on her tipi toes with the seat all the way down to reach the floor, but she’s cool with that. She says that it is smooth and the shifting is very precise. The only complaint is the hard seat, but we purchased a gel seat as a replacement. Took me about 30 minutes to fully assemble it. It was very easy and the tools are included.
customer_reviews.author: TSquare

customer_reviews.title: Junk, dont waste your money.  Chain won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: This bike is terrible. I am shocked at the positive reviews. The chain keeps coming off the bike every time my son rides it. He doesn't even switch gears & it comes off. He can't switch gears because it would come off immediately. My son used his own money to buy this piece of junk. Very disappointing. If there was a negative star review this would get it.
customer_reviews.author: somewhereintexas

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged upon arrival - fist sign of possible issues. tried to put bike together and noticed scratch marks on the under side of the frame. Front wheel would not fit into forks with out spreading them apart. Impossible to spread with one person, cut myself trying. Returned bike and decided on another bike for daughter
customer_reviews.author: norton

customer_reviews.title: Breaks on handlebars are wrong
customer_reviews.text: Most of it was easy to put together but the breaks on the handle bars were placed completely wrong and there’s no way to turn them the right way because another part is in the way and maybe there are tiny tools that can be used to unscrew these but I don’t have them. Both bikes I ordered band this way. I’m so upset because I’m not about to take them apart and return them. I got rid of the boxes too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. Cruddy seat.
customer_reviews.text: Ok EVERYTHING on this bike is like 10 stars. The seat. Is like -10. Sooooo hard and uncomfortable. That being said I ordered a extra wide memory foam ventilated one. And the bike is amazing!! Ordered the same bike for my hubby and bike seat and SOOOOOOOOO worth it. Buy a bike seat before you order this bike and your set for life.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: Good bike.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old (4'10, 80 lbs) had outgrown and worn out her 3 yr old 20" bike. I was torn between getting a 24" or 26", decided on this 24" bike. Assembling it wasn't very difficult (there is an easy-to-follow how-to video showing step by step how to put the bike together....the video is about 18 minutes long, it took me about an hour, but that was re-watcing a few things and having to re-do a couple things to get it right). It's a great fit for my daughter even with the seat all the way down, so plenty of room for her to grow on this bike...even my 5'7", 230 frame could comfortably ride this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The bike looks nice, and high is the hat drew me in. But it’s heavy, not made for distance riding as I hoped it would eventually be. It’s a “Tween” bike...small frame and not built overly well. I failed to return with the 2 week time limit so now I’m stuck with it. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Mertin

customer_reviews.title: Decent girls bike
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 11yo daughter for Christmas. Seems to be a decent bike for the money. All the welds look solid and everything fit together as it should. Pretty simple to adjust the brakes and the derailers for the gears.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, rides well and solid construction
customer_reviews.text: The bike came with all the tools needed to assemble, and the included instructional video made assembly a breeze. I bought the 20" bike for my child and it looks very nice and rides well. The 6-speed shifter is a little tight on the ends for the little hand but operates well between gears 2-5. While the paint is of good color, it seems to be very thin. I peeled off the white barcode sticker and it took off a big piece of paint with it. Now I need to find some touch-up paint to seal off the steel from the environment before it rusts...
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Front caliper bent 45 degrees off.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously you get what you pay for, but my front brake caliper was welded on completely crooked on the left side, such that the outside end of the brake pad was all that touched the wheel. I’d say it was off by almost 45 degrees. I bent the cheap metal back in place and, after some time, was able to get it close enough to straight to allow full brake pad contact. This was purchased as a donation gift, but still very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: C.H.

customer_reviews.title: Good value and great bike!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to build and not too pricey. The ride itself is like floating on a cloud, very smooth and solidly built. I liked that there was a rear derailleur guard included too. Overall, a great bike with very little disappointing characteristics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: It has been many years since I owned a Huffy bicycle. I am really liking this bike so far. I have never assembled a bicycle before and this one was very easy after I opened the box. It rides very smoothly. I have only given it an initial test ride but I can't imagine that I will have any trouble with it. This is my third Huffy bicycle in my 48 years and as usual the brand does not let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent A. DiPaula, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: This bike was supposed to be a surprise for my daughter's 8th birthday. Instead, it's missing a part and the seat cannot be installed. I took it to a professional shop for assembly new in box (never opened) and they told me it's missing a part and can't install the seat. They're out of spare parts due to the current high demand for bicycles. They told me to source the part from the manufacturer as if that's an easy task as well as time-consuming. The shop is trying hard to source the part themselves but might have to order it which will take another 1.5 weeks. Very disappointed, especially for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R. Coronel

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could return
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking bike. I was really excited to get this and start using. Once it was assembled and used, I was disappointed. The set is very narrow and uncomfortable. The steering bars/handle as much as you tighten don't fully stay in place and shift forward. The handle has a discrepancy as well and doesn't stay in place. Overall, I would have sent back/have bot purchased if I had known how it would ride prior to assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for a kid
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with this bike. I bought it for my 8 year old. He has to stand on his tiptoes to straddle it but will grow into it quickly. Assembly went well. I didn't have to adjust brakes or gears to get it working. The one thing that stands out to me is that it is hard for him to shift into first gear because you have to wrench on the shifter fairly hard to pull the spring to 1st. My daughters have similar bikes and they have the same problem so it seems to be the design. I would recommend this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ludwick

customer_reviews.title: Not for long rides
customer_reviews.text: The left peddle get really loose after the first about 7 miles of riding it and it is often a pain to tighten it because of the area it too small for regular tools so I have to use a small pair of pliers which is bad because I can never fully tighten it where it never comes loose I wanna get a new part or something or i might just send it back but I can no longer go on lengthy rides with the bike club anymore
customer_reviews.author: darius

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Bike
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this bike. It came missing a seat post for starters. Second when installing the front wheel, the wheel was positioned so far tot he left that the brake was constantly pushing up on it. There was no room for adjustment of this brake due to how poor the alignment was in the frame of the bike. You get what you pay for - cheap with missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces to a beautiful bike....
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this a 3star because while the bike is beautiful and it was simple to put together. The pedals to the bike were missing. We had to go out and buy pedals to fit this bike. It is ridiculous to buy a bike and the pedals are literally MISSING. I contacted Amazon about sending me pedals. They refused to and explained it was only possible to return or refund the product. So,word of advice is to open the box and make certain that all the product pieces are there. Do not just assume the box will have all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product not only was it late, it was also damaged. It has a small dent in the right side of the frame about the where the pedals connect to the frame. I am not sure if it was damaged from the manufacture or during shipment. I want to say from manufacturer because the box was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: 2 Flats Within the First Week
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has ridden this bike for less than a week and we've already experienced 2 flat tires on separate occasions. Now I can't be sure whether this was simply coincidence or due to the quality of the tires. I will say that we've only experienced one flat tire throughout the 3 years that my child has had his old 16 inch Giant.
customer_reviews.author: James Li

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts... rusted parts.... instructions were horrible. Terrible instructions for tools. Tools to be used are wrong if you want a good set up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first, when I bought this product, I thought that the 5-star reviews were real reviews of customers. Turns out, the quality of the bike is not very good as the derailleur broke on the second day and the bikes gears are simply not durable. This bike has taught me that you should always go for higher-priced bikes because chances are, the lower cost the product is, the less quality the product becomes. So, do not buy this bike and save up your money to either buy a bike WORTH spending your money on or just pay for something else entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Joy S. Messick

customer_reviews.title: Oh bike
customer_reviews.text: Bad Gear shifting and the chair moves up and down that breaks the point. The gear shifting wasn't that good
customer_reviews.author: Mabel

customer_reviews.title: garbage quality
customer_reviews.text: I can't expect a whole lot for the price. However, the quality of the parts is a joke. I understand they have to make their margins, but you can't unscrew the handlebar bolt without stripping it. i bought one for each of my kids and all three had the same issue. Shifting gears on the crank set is also a feat of man. You get what you pay for, but i'd NEVER recommend this bike to anyone - unless i hated the person.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: great bike. not super heavy. my 6 yo loves it. we put the seat at it's lowest and he can barely reach the ground but he loves it so much that he was determined to learn to make it work. fell many times. bike got some scratches on the first day but still in great condition. very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Jane A

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for kids or short people.
customer_reviews.text: Love my bike. I put it together fairly easy with a few tweeks here and there it has been great so far the only problem is the air in the back tire, I am not sure if I am not putting enough air in the tire or if there is a slow leak otherwise it is a great bike.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find these days
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike at a reasonable price. That’s hard to find these days. Assembly took less than an hour with few simple tools. The bike is sturdy. The Shimano rear derailleur works smoothly. The hand brakes are smooth. This should last my grandson,5, for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Broken crank with very little useof bike.
customer_reviews.text: Not many miles on bike when going over a bump caused failure in crank. The bearings 9n one of thr two rings broke appart. Upon inspection the bearing casimg had deteriorated to the point of failing to contain the bearings. I did give two stars for the fact that the rest of the bike is nice, especially the Shimano shift system.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: So this is a Fantastic Bike! There are lots of pieces, so we paid a bike shop to put it together. (Worth the $50 extra dollars) the gears work smoothly and the breaks work perfect. If you are not skilled at bike assembly, then I would recommend you find someone who is.
customer_reviews.author: wadfam

customer_reviews.title: Why don't you inflate the tires?
customer_reviews.text: The package came today. I was so excited to assemble the bike and was hoping to ride it right after that. However I found the tires were not inflated and I did not have a pump near me. That was really disappointing. Why cannot the seller inflate the tires before shipping out? It will not add any space.
customer_reviews.author: Feynman

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Update: Resolved. After 4 months I finally received the new wheel. I just wish it didn't take them so long to make it right. I ordered this for my son's birthday because every local store was sold out. This was ordered on June 8th and delivered on June17th. The front wheel was warped so I called Huffy and ordered a new front wheel. The representative said it will take 2-3 weeks...it has been almost two MONTHS. I can't call to talk to anyone because the call center closes before I get off work and they're not open on weekends. Basically I just threw away $200
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bike with minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the bike is good. It’s easy to assemble. The break is good. My kid complained the seat which was too hard and narrow and uncomfortable. So I bought a better seat to replace the original one. The kick stick is too tight for my kid.
customer_reviews.author: pandaxixi

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it my son was hurt twice cause it's cheap.
customer_reviews.text: The seat is horrible had to buy a new one. The bike easily falls apart. I had to have a bike repair person. Fix the handle bars but even that didn't work they come loose and then you can't stear. My son fell 2 times now and refuses to ride because this is a cheap bike he was hurt o. Twice. It's very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Best how to assemble video ever!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say that the assembly video for this bike was, hands down, the easiest to follow assembly video I have ever watched. My son (age 10) helped me put the bike together today and the video was 100% helpful. Way to go!
customer_reviews.author: n0name12

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The bike was repackaged poorly (read: parts could fall out of large gaps in the box) with random parts to the bike (bolts, washers, nuts, etc.) strewn throughout the bottom of the box. I was unable to assemble the bike due to missing parts. Bad form!
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for My 8 year old daughter who absolutely love it. It’s a great bike and it Was really easy to put it together. Most of it was pre assembled! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with no pedals, otherwise good bike
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these bikes for our two daughters birthday. One is just fine, but the other arrived with NO pedals in the sealed box. We have to contact manufacturer and wait I guess. A let down for a birthday girl.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Decent design. Terrible quality control. Front derailer not functional, had to go to bike shop to have adjusted (and they also had to adjust practically everything else) only to find the front fork is bent so replacement is on the way. Expectations aren't high. But it's a $100 bike I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Mac-mom

customer_reviews.title: Assembly issues
customer_reviews.text: This bike was really difficult to assemble. No matter how much you tighten the handle bars they loosen. I almost lost control in the middle of my bike ride because the handle bars moved and I lost control. I was able to prevent myself from falling. This bike is not very safe.
customer_reviews.author: kimberlee giddens

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace this bike because a part in the seat wasn't right. Which was easy. Then the second one went together perfectly until my husband went to ride it and the hand bars wouldn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy build and great value.... with couple of small flaws...
customer_reviews.text: The seat pole will not pull out for adjustment after it's been tightened once at the lowest setting. I guess I'll have to buy my kid a new bike when she grows a few more inches. Second flaw is the kickstand. It's way too stiff for even an adult to kick it back up. If these two flaws were fixed in the future, this bike will be flawless... ha ha ha. Great value and great build.
customer_reviews.author: Han Solo

customer_reviews.title: missing, broken part
customer_reviews.text: The bike assembled quite easily with the instructions and functions well so far. There are two minor issues the white plastic locking nut that holds rear reflector to spoke was broken. Also the set screw in the front brake hand grip is missing. I can be reached at corey.elliott@nypa.gov.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: For the price, great bike
customer_reviews.text: For the price there is nothing I can complain about. It’s reliable and durable. Overall great mountain bike. Only complaint is the seat is super uncomfortable but that’s nothing that can’t be fixed with a couple more dollars
customer_reviews.author: Elijah J.

customer_reviews.title: weak dropout
customer_reviews.text: it is a good bike except for the weak dropout, almost all steel bikes I have seen recently have that problem. why? who is responsible for this rotten thing. I want to know now.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike for the money. Will suit our needs. Very attractive and easy to handle. Light weight yer doesn’t feel weak or flimsy. Did order a gel dear for added comfort.
customer_reviews.author: kim head

customer_reviews.title: Buy it with Caution
customer_reviews.text: I am writing a review after using it for more then three weeks. Over all it is a below average buy, decent looking but seat comfort is below average. Gear system could be smooth Gear system is so bad that keep on making weird noise, like it is going to come out, if you riding it on higher gear and actually it happened to me as well. I will not suggest you to buy it but if you don't have any option and you really want to than your call.
customer_reviews.author: raghu

customer_reviews.title: decent enough bike but problem with the brakes
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves the bike but it's not safe. The front brake wire broke where it connects to the front tire brake only after a few rides. We've only owned this bike less than a month and already problems and no way to contact the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike and With Very Little Assembly
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bike for our daughters Birthday. Arrived on time and she loves it. Very easy to put together. You do need a little bike tuning skills since you may have to fine tune the breaks and gear shifters. Otherwise great bike! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Dan

customer_reviews.title: shipping
customer_reviews.text: Why did UPS put the Bicycle against my front door and I could not get out of the house. Had to go out back door and come around and move it to open the front door. That ticked me off.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had never bought a bike from amazon before and had been expect for something less great. But, after assembly it, which was surprisingly easy with the video provided, the bike was perfect and had no issues at all. I would totally recommend, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Meijia Lin

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! Needed a bike to last the last year of my son's high school, and this was a cheap and solid choice. Impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Chen Allen

customer_reviews.title: Seat keeps falling
customer_reviews.text: This bike was a little shorter then expected. The seat constantly falls even after tightening. The metallic blur color is nice and the gears shift well!
customer_reviews.author: Marci Viens

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike!
customer_reviews.text: This really is a great bike for the price. Ordered for our grandson birthday. There is some set up & thank goodness, my husband easily accomplished!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Boston

customer_reviews.title: Warranty?
customer_reviews.text: Brake handle was broken at first day. Bike didn’t fall. Is it a warranty case?
customer_reviews.author: Evgeny Konovalov

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for an occasional rider
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike for the price. The install was for the most part easy but just like other reviewers have said getting the front brakes adjusted correctly was a bit of work that was frustrating at first but then after fidgeting with it for a bit I saw where the issue was and was able to fix it easy. The only thing I would say I don’t like about this bike is that the seat is pretty hard and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: crystal peart

customer_reviews.title: This bike all you need
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this as a birthday gift and I absolutely loved it. Another great item sold by Amazon. I love it, so easy to assemble and great for riding
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: bike came damaged. frame bend and the wheel bend. Its a waste of my money. I couldnt even return it because I live in Turks and Caicos. it would cost me too much to send it back. not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: CHERLINE DICKENSON

customer_reviews.title: The quality is junk and the installation instruction are poor.
customer_reviews.text: First, I purchased this on prime day at a prime day discount but the very next day the price drop $20. Second the bike is cheap quality and construction. It has taken a while trying to get it adjusted so everything works. I kinda expected it for the price. I will update the review after my son rides it around for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Handlebars loose on both bikes and wont adjust
customer_reviews.text: Bike looked great . Bought 2 for the kids. Both bikes handlebars are loose to where they turn while riding it. Both are as tight as you can get them and its still loose. Would not recommend this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bike had so many pieces that wouldnt stay put
customer_reviews.text: This bike fell apart many times. The pedals keep coming loose and so do the handle bars. I will not be buying bikes from Amazon again
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level bike
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and quality as an entry level bike for a younger kid. Had to disable the 21-speed and lock as a 7-speed to get it to operate consistently, but 7-speeds is fine for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t change gears well.
customer_reviews.text: We’d probably return it if we didn’t have to dissembled. The gears are extremely hard to switch and they don’t stay in first gear.
